Package cryptotrader.user

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • cryptotrader.user.User
  • public class User
extends Object
    This class represents the User class. In the MVC architecture, this is the controller.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    David Tran

                   throws CoinAPIException
